explains: n. 试车；插入部分；争论

sentences.en: That race was run in scorching weather.
sentences.cn: 那次赛跑是在酷热的天气里进行的。

sentences.en: The show had a record-breaking run in the London theatre.
sentences.cn: 这出戏在伦敦剧院连续上演，打破了演出纪录。

sentences.en: The bank must be run in a cost-effective way.
sentences.cn: 银行必须以有成本效益的方式经营。
